name: lifelessness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of not being or not seeming to be alive: The skin is a mottled yellow, plasticky in its lifelessness.
a lack of energy or interest: The therapy can be good for low spirits and lifelessness. This chapter more than compensates for the lifelessness of other parts of the book.
More examplesFewer examplesThe doctors said they had never heard of anyone coming round after 30 minutes of apparent lifelessness, let alone a young baby.In this barren desert, in midst of such lifelessness, the fact that a complex society emerged here can seem like a miracle. Where in the first half of the game there had been lifelessness, there was now energy and commitment. She seemed calm to the point of lifelessness.
